headline: Dr Oz reverses course on keeping Turkish citizenship if elected to Senate
author: Andrew Feinberg
sentences: Dr Oz, who was born in Ohio and is a US citizen, but acquired dual Turkish citizenship through his parents and maintained it as an adult through service in the Turkish Army, had previously told reporters he would not renounce his Turkish citizenship even if it means he must forego the access to classified information granted to members of Congress.
